challenges.name: Slowwww Dance
challenges.description: Slow Dance by yourself in the corner softly caressing your shoulders for 2 minutes (or one whole song).  Don’t acknowledge anyone!

challenges.name: Now That's A Muscle!
challenges.description: Get a photo of yourself while feeling the muscle of a stranger and yelling out “Now That's A Muscle!!!”.

challenges.name: Lather Me Up
challenges.description: Dance for 2 minutes while acting like you are lathering yourself up for a bath!  Do it soft and sexy raaawrrr.

challenges.name: T-Rex Spotting
challenges.description: T-Rex's vision is based on movement!  Remain STILL for 2 whole minutes.  You can blink, but if you flinch you fail!

challenges.name: Reindeer Who?
challenges.description: Name 5 of Santa's Reindeer in 30 seconds.  Ready Go!

challenges.name: Embrassez moi
challenges.description: Get a kiss on the cheek from a complete stranger.

challenges.name: I Choose You!
challenges.description: Create a challenge for the player of your choosing.

challenges.name: That's My Tune
challenges.description: Sing your favorite childhood song for all to hear and make it good!

challenges.name: How I Mate
challenges.description: Shout out your BEST mating call.  Don't hold back!

challenges.name: Spank You
challenges.description: Get spanked 3x by a complete stranger.

challenges.name: Feels Good!
challenges.description: Do 10 pushups while calling out “OOOOoooo Yeah!  Look how good I look!  Everybody look!”

challenges.name: Landing On The Moon
challenges.description: Moon Walk around the bar 1x, spin and strike a pose.

challenges.name: Traveling Clapper
challenges.description: Giving your best disco walk while clapping above your head.

challenges.name: Great Lakes
challenges.description: Name all 5 of the Great Lakes

challenges.name: I'm Semi Famous
challenges.description: Get someone to autograph your chest.

challenges.name: I Got Gains
challenges.description: Get a photo of a stranger feeling your muscle while flexing!

challenges.name: Become A Lord
challenges.description: Give the table your best Lord Of The Dance impression.

challenges.name: All Access
challenges.description: Let the player to your right text one person in your phone whatever they want!

challenges.name: Twerk it
challenges.description: Can you twerk?  It doesn't matter.  You're about to try it for 1 minute.  Ready Go!

challenges.name: Quick High Five!
challenges.description: You sir have 30 seconds to get 5 high fives.  Ready Go!

challenges.name: Muscle Man
challenges.description: Muscle Man Contest!  Stand in the corner flexing your muscles for 1 minute.

challenges.name: I Am A Robot
challenges.description: Do your best robot dance for 2 minutes.

challenges.name: Soooo Much Water
challenges.description: Name all 5 Oceans in 30 seconds

challenges.name: Mime Challenge!
challenges.description: You are a mime.  The table chooses the scene and you must act it out for 2min.  Ex. Stuck in a box

challenges.name: All Access
challenges.description: Let the player to your right text one person in your phone whatever they want!

challenges.name: I Can Also Sing
challenges.description: Give us your BEST Opera impression and make it good!

challenges.name: P-I-M-P
challenges.description: Take a photo with two people kissing you on the cheek.

challenges.name: Jumping Jack
challenges.description: Let's see you do 10 jumping jacks while yelling out “I am so getting beefed up!”

challenges.name: Sweet Whisper
challenges.description: Approach a stranger with a serious face and say “It's good to see you again”  Then whisper “The time machine worked”.

challenges.name: Fabulous
challenges.description: Approach a stranger, point at them from head to toe and say “Fabulous”.  Snap your fingers then walk away.

challenges.name: I Didn't Post That!
challenges.description: Player to your right gets to post whatever they want on your social media account.

challenges.name: Pose Off!
challenges.description: Roll up your sleeves and do a 1 minute gun show.  Give us your best photos.

challenges.name: Shakespeare
challenges.description: Finish This Line: O Romeo, Romeo,wh.....

challenges.name: Pushing Down Gravity
challenges.description: It's Push Up TIME!  Get down on the ground maggot and give me 10 pushups!

challenges.name: Marco!
challenges.description: Yell Out “Marco”and get at least one stranger to yell out “Polo”.

challenges.name: Yee Haw!
challenges.description: Saddle up partner.  We are about to see you ride your 'fake horse' around the room!

challenges.name: I Didn't Post That!
challenges.description: Player to your left gets to post whatever they want on your social media account.

challenges.name: You Even Lift?
challenges.description: You call those muscles? Get a stranger to take a photo of you flexing like a professional wrestler.

challenges.name: Marry Me
challenges.description: Get a photo of yourself proposing to a stranger.  Make it good!

challenges.name: I Choose You!
challenges.description: Create a challenge for the player of your choosing.

challenges.name: Oh That's Sexy
challenges.description: Get out on the dance floor, hands above your head and begin to give the sexiest dance you can come up with.

challenges.name: Base-ketball
challenges.description: Player has 1 minute to name 10 professional basketball teams.  Ready Go!

challenges.name: The British Are Coming
challenges.description: Ride your invisible horse around the bar yelling “The British Are Coming!”

challenges.name: Pop A Squat
challenges.description: Get into position and give us 10 squats!

challenges.name: Natural Spinner
challenges.description: I LOVE to spin don't you?! Get somewhere with room and spin 25x in a row.

challenges.name: Tattoo Artist
challenges.description: Roll up your sleeves.  You have to get 10 strangers to autograph your arms. Ready Go!

challenges.name: National Pride
challenges.description: Stand up and sing the National Anthem out loud for all to hear!

challenges.name: Planets Aligned
challenges.description: Name all 9 of the planets in our solar system.  Countdown 1 minute.  Ready Go!

challenges.name: Negative Nancy
challenges.description: Go around the table and say something negative about each person.

piker.name: Meeeeyow
piker.description: Don't you love kitties?!  You're about to become one.  Players get draw whiskers on Piker's face.

piker.name: Glamor Shot
piker.description: Table get's to style Piker and do a full photoshoot session with him, posting everything to his social media.

piker.name: Love That Scene
piker.description: Pick your favorite movie scene and act it out as best as you can.  Make it good because your friends will be recording it!  Action!

piker.name: Artist Scene
piker.description: Draw on a napkin or piece of paper.  Finished with your art?  Now you have to sell it to a stranger for $1.
